name: Jibo
description: A social robot designed to interact with humans using expressive movements and speech.

name: Alexa
description: Amazon’s voice assistant used in Echo devices for smart home control and information.

name: Google Assistant
description: Google’s AI assistant that helps with questions, tasks, and smart devices.

name: Vector
description: A small AI-powered robot by Anki with personality, voice interaction, and autonomy.

name: Cozmo
description: A playful educational robot by Anki designed to teach coding and AI concepts.

name: Woobo
description: A friendly robot companion designed for children, focused on learning and play.

name: Miko 2
description: An educational AI robot for kids that supports learning, games, and conversations.

name: Misa
description: A friendly AI robot companion designed for learning and interaction, often used for education and family-friendly entertainment.

name: Moxie
description: A social-emotional learning robot designed to help children develop communication skills.

name: Romo Robot
description: A smartphone-powered robot that can move, see, and interact using apps.
